remarks: A relationship between dominance over the powerset and strict dominance when the sets involved are infinite GCH-sets.  Proposition 3.1 of [KanamoriPincus] p. 421.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-May-2015.)
statement: gchpwdom $p |- ( ( _om ~<_ A /\ A e. GCH /\ B e. GCH ) -> ( A ~< B <-> ~P A ~<_ B ) ) $.
